title: Develop Multi-Factor Authentication Mechanism
description: As a customer, I want to verify my identity using multiple factors, so that my account remains secure.
attributes_and_rules: Passwords, OTPs, Biometric methods, Encrypted credential storage, Session timeouts, Failed attempt lockouts, Device recognition
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users verify identity using a password and one additional factor.
2. The system locks out users after a set number of failed attempts.
3. Encrypted credentials are stored securely.
4. Session timeouts are enforced.
test_cases:
Given a user, when they attempt to log in, then they must provide a password and an OTP.
Given a user, when they fail to log in multiple times, then their account should be locked.
Given authenticated activity, when verification is performed, then the credentials should be encrypted.
Given a session, when inactive, then it should timeout after a predefined period.

title: Create Personalized Dashboard Layout
description: As a customer, I want a dashboard personalized to my information, so that I can easily manage my banking products.
attributes_and_rules: Account summaries, Balances, Offers, Alerts, Modular design, Real-time data display
acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard shows user-specific account information.
2. The information displayed is updated in real-time.
3. Users can customize the layout based on preferences.
test_cases:
Given a logged-in user, when viewing the dashboard, then their account summaries and alerts should be displayed.
Given an account update, when data changes, then the dashboard should update in real-time.
Given user preferences, when configuring the dashboard, then the layout should reflect their customization.

epic_title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface Design
title: Develop Responsive User Interface
description: As a user, I want the portal to provide a consistent experience across devices, so that I can access my banking services seamlessly.
attributes_and_rules: Desktop, Tablet, Mobile, Adaptive UI frameworks, Accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1), High-contrast modes, Keyboard navigation, Screen readers, Optimized load times
acceptance_criteria:
1. The interface adapts seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and mobiles.
2. Accessibility guidelines (e.g., WCAG 2.1) are met.
3. Navigation and interactions are optimized for all devices.
test_cases:
Given different devices, when accessing the portal, then the interface should adapt accordingly.
Given accessibility options, when enabled, then the portal should provide high-contrast modes and screen reader support.
Given various devices, when navigating, then the interface should remain consistent and responsive.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Implement Digital Workflows for Account Applications
description: As a customer, I want guided workflows for account applications, so that I can complete the process with minimal effort.
attributes_and_rules: Guided workflows, Simple steps, Real-time validation, Automated KYC and AML verification, Progress tracking, Immediate confirmations
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users are guided through each step of the account application.
2. Real-time validations occur at each step.
3. Automated KYC and AML verifications are integrated.
4. Users can track progress and receive confirmations.
test_cases:
Given an account application, when progressing through the workflow, then each step should be simple and validated in real-time.
Given user actions, when certain criteria are met, then automated KYC and AML verifications should be performed.
Given an application, when processed, then users should be able to track their progress and receive immediate confirmations.
